contents.text: Thank you for calling Intercom in San Francisco, your partner in modern sales, marketing, and support solutions.
For sales and marketing solutions, press 1.
For product demos and free trials, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for product demonstrations.

navigationGoals: Arrange a quick demo of the sales and marketing suite.
I’d like to schedule a live demonstration of your chat platform for my veteran-owned small business.
I'd like to schedule a live demo of your API-driven chatbot and CRM integration.
I'd like someone to walk me through how your messaging solution works so I can decide if it's right for me.
Schedule a live demo of the Intercom sales messaging platform.

contents.text: For pricing and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and finance team.

navigationGoals: Confirm the total due on our annual plan renewal.
I need information on subscription pricing and any veteran discounts you offer.
I need a detailed breakdown of billing cycles and pricing tiers for our enterprise subscription.
I'm calling to understand my bill and payment options for my Intercom subscription.
Ask about student discounts and monthly pricing for the marketing solution.

contents.text: For customer support and service, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support specialists.

navigationGoals: Fix the chat widget not loading on our website.
I’m experiencing issues with my Intercom widget loading on my site and need technical assistance.
I'm experiencing webhook timeouts in my integration and need technical troubleshooting assistance.
My chat window on my website isn't showing up—I need help fixing it.
Troubleshoot an error causing my website chat widget not to load.

contents.text: For account and subscription management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account services department.

navigationGoals: Upgrade my subscription to include additional user seats.
I want to update my current plan and apply my veteran discount to my subscription.
I want to upgrade our user seats and modify our subscription plan settings.
I want to update my payment method and check when my subscription renews.
Upgrade my subscription to add an additional teammate seat.
